12570275.json.title: Prevention of acute myocardial infarction induced heart failure by intracoronary infusion of mesenchymal stem cells: phase 3 randomised clinical trial (PREVENT-TAHA8)

gaps: No explicit correction for multiplicity despite multiple secondary endpoints and subgroup analyses
Blinding description lacks detail on allocation concealment process
Sample size calculation uses 'approximate' rates which could be more precise

12660148.json.title: Spatial multiomic landscape of the human placenta at molecular resolution

gaps: Sample size justification lacks power calculation details
Blinding not explicitly described (noted as not relevant)

12618242.json.title: A multimodal whole-slide foundation model for pathology

strengths: Accounted for data dependency using GLMM models
gaps: Sample size lacks power calculation (common in ML studies)
P-values reported without effect size metrics
